wikipedia_page.main: John Holt (27 May 1922 – 4 February 1966) was a British swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay at the 1948 Summer Olympics.

response: * John Holt (publisher) (1721–1784), publisher and mayor of Williamsburg, Virginia
